summary: This is a Player House Mod, it is for those who want the ultimate Collectors Home.  While it doesn't have every unique Item, Armor and Weapon it does have WAY MORE than most.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wXyQPDk.png[/img]

I want to give a special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27255744/?]JenModding[/url] for being my Publisher, Editor and Beta Tester <3 <3 <3 <3 <3  Without Jen I would not of been able to release my mod <3 <3 <3 <3  Not enough hearts in the world<3
I also wish to thank my Note Testers. <3 


[b][font=Courier New][color=#D4AF37][size=3]~ Features ~[/size][/color][/font][/b]
Light Switches – One Main House Switch, One Main Basement Switch, Separate Switches for the Bedrooms
 
Bedrooms - Hearthfire Friendly (2 Child Beds Only), Multi-Follower Friendly (6 Beds), Main Bedroom for Player.
 
Library - 1100 Total Books[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Enchanting\Alchemy\Staff\Imbuing Stations[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Basement Forge[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Standing Stones[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Blessing Shrines[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Linked Drop Off Container Outside[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Unique Armors & Weapons Containers -For Items Not on Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Working Ladders[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Light-able Fireplaces[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Working Sink[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Custom Containers[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Axe & Pickaxe Holder -By Front Door[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] 12 Large Display Classes[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] 6 Dagger Display Cases[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] 29 Mannequins[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] 21 Weapon Racks[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] 18 Planters


[b][font=Courier New][color=#D4AF37][size=3]~ Main Display Items~[/size][/color][/font][/b]
Thieves Guild - Items are added to the display by completing The Litany of Larceny quests, the items for the display are linked
to the originals.  No need to steal them back or use CC.

Bugs in a Jar Display - Outside[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Hold Shields Displays[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Civil War Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Amulets of the 9 Divines Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Paragon Stones Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Dragon Claws Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Dragon Priest Masks Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Elder Scrolls Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Daedric Artifacts Display[b][i][color=#D4AF37][size=3]/[/size][/color][/i][/b] Black Book Display

Plus More - Download the optional file to find out


[b][font=Courier New][color=#D4AF37][size=3]~ Notes/Clues ~[/size][/color][/font][/b]
To get the key for Saan Bok, you have to follow the clues that are laid out in the notes.  The first Note is located on the doorstep of the home and just in case you need some help here is a hint to help you find the next one.

[i]Where do travels go to rest?[/i]

author: MadamJaye
